document.full_text: the new york yankees returned to action after two days off with a 7-4 win over the baltimore orioles on wednesday, while stalwarts derek jeter and alex rodriguez moved up on two all-time lists.
document.title: refreshed yankees beat orioles 7-4
lines_and_colors: the new york yankees returned to action after two days off with a 7-4 win over the baltimore orioles on wednesday, while stalwarts derek jeter and alex rodriguez moved up on two all-time lists.
